fields.label: Contact Form Contact Person
fields.name: contact_form_contact_person
fields.instructions: This is the person that any contact form emails will go to.

fields.label: Contact Form Contact Email
fields.name: contact_form_contact_email
fields.instructions: This is the email of the designated contact person set for the contact form.
fields.placeholder: Enter the designated person's contact email...

fields.label: Developer Name
fields.name: developer_name
fields.instructions: This could be the developer company or the developer themselves.

fields.label: CMS Used
fields.name: cms_used
fields.instructions: This is an optional field.  Totally un-necessary.

fields.label: Company Social Media
fields.name: company_social_media
fields.instructions: Provide the social media links for the business in question.

sub_fields.label: Service Subheadline
sub_fields.name: service_subheadline
sub_fields.instructions: This is for the subheadline that appears right after the Service section title and the line.

sub_fields.label: About Us Subheadline
sub_fields.name: about_us_subheadline
sub_fields.instructions: This is the subheadline that appears under the About title and line.
sub_fields.default_value: Your Personal Health and Wellness Team

sub_fields.label: About Extra Text
sub_fields.name: about_extra_text
sub_fields.default_value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

sub_fields.label: Newsletter Headline
sub_fields.name: newsletter_headline
sub_fields.instructions: This can be a headline or straight call to action.
sub_fields.default_value: GET ALL THE LATEST HOT TIPS ON NATURE MARKETING AND STAY UP TO DATE ABOUT WHAT WE'RE UP TO.

sub_fields.label: Newsletter Extra Text
sub_fields.name: newsletter_extra_text
sub_fields.instructions: This could be a one two punch benefit or simply a statement about privacy protection.
sub_fields.default_value: WE RESPECT YOUR EMAIL PRIVACY AND YOU'RE ADDRESS WILL NEVER BE GIVEN TO 3RD PARTIES WITHOUT YOUR PERMISSION.

sub_fields.label: Product Subheadline
sub_fields.name: product_subheadline
sub_fields.instructions: An optional subheadline of sorts.  You might mention a USP benefit or focus on benefits.
sub_fields.default_value: Products that help you feel amazing again.

sub_fields.label: Product Extra Text
sub_fields.name: product_extra_text
sub_fields.instructions: This area goes right after the subheadline.
sub_fields.placeholder: Our products are manufactured to meet the stricted GMP standards.

sub_fields.label: Contact Extra Text
sub_fields.name: contact_extra_text
sub_fields.instructions: This is the extra copy text under the sub headline.

sub_fields.label: Extra Copy
sub_fields.name: extra_copy
sub_fields.instructions: This could be used for additional benefit copy for example... to reinforce the decision to contact you.

fields.label: Member Social Media Links
fields.name: member_social_media_links
fields.instructions: This repeater field stores references to all of that member's social media links.

sub_fields.label: Twitter
sub_fields.name: twitter
sub_fields.instructions: Provide the link to the member's Twitter profile.

sub_fields.label: Facebook
sub_fields.name: facebook
sub_fields.instructions: Insert the link to the member's Facebook profile.

sub_fields.label: RSS
sub_fields.name: rss
sub_fields.instructions: Insert the link to the member's RSS feed either on this site or another one of theirs.

sub_fields.label: LinkedIn
sub_fields.name: linkedin
sub_fields.instructions: Insert the member's link to their LinkedIn profile.

fields.label: Member Role
fields.name: member_role
fields.instructions: This is the title, position or role of the member in the organization.

fields.label: Member Personal Web Site
fields.name: member_personal_web_site
fields.instructions: This is the member's personal web site or other web site.

fields.label: Service Icon
fields.name: service_icon
fields.instructions: This is the Font Awesome service icon name that you will use in the php to display the correct icon.  If you're using another icon set you may need to customize things.

fields.label: Skill Value
fields.name: skill_value
fields.instructions: This is the approximate measured skill value as a percentage out of 100%.

fields.label: Testimonial Person Role
fields.name: testimonial_person_role
fields.instructions: This is the role of the person giving the testimonial.

fields.label: Testimonial Person Company
fields.name: testimonial_person_company
fields.instructions: This is the company name that the person giving the testimonial works for.  Not always required especially if the person is a sole proprietor.

fields.label: Testimonial Person Web Site
fields.name: testimonial_person_web_site
fields.instructions: This is the testimonial giver's company web site.
